title: Service Agreement and Privacy Policy
message:
Please read and fully understand the terms of the 'Service Agreement' and 'Privacy Policy', including but not limited to: In order to provide you with better services, we need to collect your device identifiers, operation logs, and other information for analysis and optimization of application performance.
　　You can read the Service Agreement and Privacy Policy for more details. If you agree, please click the button below to start using our service.

messageLocales.en:
Please read and fully understand the terms of the 'Service Agreement' and 'Privacy Policy', including but not limited to: In order to provide you with better services, we need to collect your device identifiers, operation logs, and other information for analysis and optimization of application performance.
　　You can read the Service Agreement and Privacy Policy for more details. If you agree, please click the button below to start using our service.
messageLocales.zh-Hans:
您需要阅读并充分理解“服务协议”和“隐私政策”的条款，包括但不限于：为了向您提供更好的服务，我们需要收集您的设备标识符、操作日志等信息，用于分析和优化应用性能。
设备信息：当您使用我们的服务时，我们可能会收集您的设备唯一识别码（如IMEI、设备序列号、OAID、MEID、Android ID、IMSI、GUID、MAC地址、SIM卡序列号等。）、设备型号、操作系统版本、设备设置、网络信息（如 IP 地址）等。位置信息：当您使用基于位置的服务时，我们可能会收集您的地理位置信息（如经纬度）。您可以通过关闭定位功能，停止对您的地理位置信息的收集。
　　您可以阅读服务协议和隐私政策了解更多详情。如果您同意，请点击下方按钮开始使用我们的服务。
